title: Roswell Crash (1947)

title: Ruwa School (1994)
description: Schoolchildren in Zimbabwe report a craft and beings.

title: Incident Nimitz / Tic-Tac

title: Hessdalen Lights
description: Recurring unexplained lights in Norway studied by scientists.
